original_title: Dialog Television has good news for cricket fans
original_body_lines: Cricket fans, rejoice! Dialog Television, Sri Lanka’s No.1 television experience has some exciting news for you. In anticipation of the upcoming cricket season, the Dialog television postpaid Connection Fee has been reduced from Rs. 7,990/- to an exclusive price of just Rs. 4,990/-, just so you can enjoy all the thrills of the game from the comfort of home, at an affordable price!

That’s great news! The 2023 ODI Cricket World Cup Qualifier series is telecasted on Star Sports 1 (Channel No. 68) and Star Sports 1 HD (Channel No. 120). The best part is that there is no additional cost for you to enjoy the matches until July 14th.

To access this incredible offer, just visit the nearest Dialog Experience centre or place your order online on dialog.lk so you can have your Dialog Television connection delivered right to your doorstep, without any delivery fees. This offer is valid until the 30th of June 2023, and only until stocks last.
